required.name: Belarus
required.note: Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival.

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Cameroon
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: China
required.note: 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Shenyang and Xi'an.

required.name: Eritrea
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Ghana
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Kazakhstan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Liberia
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Libya
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.

required.name: Sierra Leone
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Turkmenistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Uzbekistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Vietnam
required.note: Pre-arranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Ho Chi Minh, Hanoi, Phu Quoc, or Danang. 30 day visa exemption at Phu Quoc Island.

not-required.name: Canada
not-required.note: 6 months; eTA required if arriving by air from 15 March 2016.

not-required.name: Dominican Republic
not-required.note: 90 days (10 USD Tourist Card valid for 30 days must be purchased upon arrival)

not-required.name: Indonesia
not-required.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

not-required.name: Thailand
not-required.note: 30 days by air, 15 days by land

not-required.name: Zambia
not-required.note: 90 days as tourists, 30 days for business

on-arrival.name: Bangladesh
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Cape Verde
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Djibouti
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Ethiopia
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Laos
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Nepal
on-arrival.note: 90 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Qatar
on-arrival.note: 1 month. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days at Dushanbe International Airport. Visa also available online for those arriving via Dushanbe or Khujand airports.

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

unknown.name: Australia
unknown.note: 90 days on each visit in 12-month period if granted

unknown.name: Ivory Coast
unknown.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

unknown.name: Gabon
unknown.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

unknown.name: Jordan
unknown.note: Conditions apply. Not available at all entry points.
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Kenya
unknown.note: 3 months; also visa on arrival until 1 September 2015

unknown.name: Madagascar
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Marshall Islands
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Myanmar
unknown.note: 28 days, eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.

unknown.name: Papua New Guinea
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Samoa
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free Entry Permit on arrival

unknown.name: Seychelles
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free Visitor's Permit on arrival

unknown.name: Solomon Islands
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free Visitor's permit on arrival

unknown.name: Tonga
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Tuvalu
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: United Arab Emirates
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: United States
unknown.note: 90 days on arrival from overseas; ESTA (valid for 2 years when issued) required if arriving by air or cruise ship.
